txt.en: Kh창nai at the expedition camp desires more buffalo haunches and hides. Her patron in Umbar City sees an increase in the value of the beast and wants more to maximize their profit.
Return the haunches and hides to Kh창nai at the expedition camp
'Head north toward the desert or beyond into the savannah. You will find the buffalo in those areas. Hunt them for their haunches and hides and return what you collect to me.'
'Head north toward the desert or beyond into the savannah. You will find the buffalo in those areas. Hunt them for their haunches and hides and return what you collect to me.'
Water buffalo that roam throughout the eastern span of the Cape of Umbar grow in value. Kh창nai offers payment for collecting haunches and hides from the beast. She resides at the expedition camp.

'Water buffalo are the choice of the moment in Umbar City. My patron demands that more haunches and hides be collected and delivered to them. Will you venture into the desert and plains in search of the buffaloes, claim their hides and haunches, and return them to me?'
Return the haunches and hides to Kh창nai at the expedition camp

'This meets my quota and will satisfy the request from my patron. I am pleased that this relationship between us works so well. Please, return tomorrow. I am certain that there will be more activities that need meeting.'
